text: Diomedes de Jesús Díaz Maestre (May 26, 1956 - December 22, 2013"Murió en Cesar el cantante Diomedes Díaz" Noticias Caracol. Retrieved 23 December 2013. ) was a Colombian vallenato singer, songwriter and composer. His nickname was "El Cacique de la Junta" (the chieftain of the Junta). It was given to him early in his career by another vallenato singer, Rafael Orozco Maestre."Diomedes Díaz: El Cacique de la Junta." ColombiaLink.com. Accessed 29 September 2006. Díaz died in Valledupar at the age of 56. He was resting in his bed when his heart failed and he stopped breathing. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1956 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Colombian singer-songwriters
title: Diomedes Díaz
